Sentence_Chinese: 这个男人很有魅力，大家都很喜欢他。
Sentence_pinyin: Zhège nánrén hěn yǒu mèilì, dàjiā dōu hěn xǐhuan tā.
Sentence_english: This man is very attractive, we all like him.

Definition: to plan, to plan to do sth.
Sentence_Chinese: 你计划去哪几个国家旅游？
Sentence_pinyin: Nǐ jìhuà qù nǎ jǐ ge guójiā lǚyóu?
Sentence_english: What countries are you planning to go to?
